items.title: Oil and gas: environmental alert notices
items.summary: Published environmental alert notices issued in order to raise awareness of any environmental issues on the United Kingdom Continental Shelf (UKCS).

items.title: Carbon capture, usage and storage (CCUS): non-pipeline transport
items.summary: We're seeking views on policy proposals to support the deployment of domestic non-pipeline transport (NPT) projects.

items.title: Policy paper: UK–California climate and energy agreement
items.summary: Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) between the UK and the State of California on climate, clean energy and environment cooperation.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.title: Guidance: Contracts for Difference (CfD) Allocation Round 8: Clean Industry Bonus framework and guidance
items.summary: The CfD Clean Industry Bonus will allow fixed and floating offshore wind applicants to get extra CfD revenue support if they choose to invest in more sustainable supply chains.

items.title: Research: Regulator dashboard
items.summary: Information and key performance indicators (KPIs) from 16 UK regulators, published quarterly as part of the UK government’s Regulatory Action Plan.

items.title: Policy paper: Global Clean Power Alliance: finance mission update (November 2025)
items.summary: This update sets out progress under the Global Clean Power Alliance (GCPA) finance mission at COP30 in Belém.

items.title: Research: Space based solar power
items.summary: Studies on the technical feasibility, costs, economics of space‑based solar power (SBSP) and potential early‑market adoption pathways for to help deliver the UK’s net zero policy.

items.title: Notice: CCUS East Coast Cluster: Teesside selection process
items.summary: Apply to take part in the ECC Teesside selection process for projects seeking connection to the Teesside network by 2032.

items.title: Guidance: Designated standards: toy safety
items.summary: Notices of publication and a consolidated list for designated standards for toy safety.

items.title: Notice: DESNZ public appointments: privacy notice
items.summary: How we will use your personal data and what your rights are.

items.title: Notice: Smart Meter System based Internet of Things applications programme: successful projects
items.summary: This programme funded the development, trial and demonstration of Smart Meter Systems based IoT sensor devices and their proposed technical applications.

items.title: Clean Energy Jobs Fair held at Barnsley College
items.summary: Around 175 school pupils and college students from across South Yorkshire visited the fair to find out about jobs in clean energy.

items.title: Notice: Green Heat Network Fund (GHNF): Round 11 application guidance
items.summary: Capital grant support is available for the development of new and existing low-carbon heat networks. This page contains guidance and details of how to apply via Triple Point.

items.title: Warm Home Discount (WHD): cost recovery
items.summary: We are seeking views on whether WHD costs should move from standing charges to the per-unit rate.

items.title: Policy paper: Government response to the Post Office Horizon IT Inquiry report (volume 1)
items.summary: The government's response to volume 1 of the Post Office Horizon IT Inquiry report.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on ironing boards from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for International Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on ironing boards from China.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK renewables
items.summary: Data on the UK’s renewables sector, including capacity, electricity generation and liquid biofuels consumption.

items.title: Vote of confidence in UK as Singapore firm moves HQ to Liverpool
items.summary: Vote of confidence in UK as Singaporean firm moves HQ to Liverpool

items.title: Policy paper: Implementing the Plan to Make Work Pay and Employment Rights Act
items.summary: The updated implementation timeline for the government’s Plan to Make Work Pay and the Employment Rights Act 2025.

items.title: Guidance: Training on export control compliance
items.summary: Courses, seminars, workshops and webinars to help exporters understand their obligations under export control legislation.

items.title: Regulations: heat networks (metering and billing)
items.summary: Guidance for heat suppliers.

items.title: Policy paper: Local Power Plan
items.summary: The Local Power Plan ensures that communities directly benefit from the energy they help to produce.

items.title: Notice: Reformed National Pricing (RNP): NESO calls for input on proposed electricity market reforms
items.summary: The National Energy System Operator (NESO) has published a Call for Input (CfI) on proposed electricity market reforms to support its efficient operation and future development.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals: proving your identity
items.summary: Guidance on how to prove your identity and the relevant ID verification checks needed as part of the Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals process.

items.title: Research: Carbon capture, usage and storage (CCUS): business models
items.summary: Updates on the proposed commercial frameworks for transport and storage, power, and industrial carbon capture business models.

items.title: Decision: UK-Central America committee documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from UK-Central America countries committees.

items.title: Guidance: Taking part in the UK Emissions Trading Scheme markets
items.summary: This guidance explains the operation of the UK ETS markets and how to take part in auctions and in trading on the secondary market.

items.title: Decision: Outer Dowsing Offshore Wind Farm: development consent order, Planning Act 2008
items.summary: Decision by the Secretary of State on an application by GT R4 Limited for an offshore wind farm located approximately 54 km off the Lincolnshire coast in the southern North Sea.

items.title: Horizon Europe funding
items.summary: Funding for research or innovation that's ground breaking, improves European research standards or responds to challenges like climate change or food security.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel and panel chair privacy notice
items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: legal costs framework
items.summary: This guidance sets out the legal costs the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) will cover for Capture Redress Scheme applicants.

items.title: Transparency data: Post Office Horizon financial redress and legal costs data for 2025
items.summary: Data for 2025 on redress for postmasters impacted by the Post Office Horizon scandal.

items.title: Transparency data: Post Office Horizon financial redress and legal costs data for 2026
items.summary: Data for 2026 on redress for postmasters impacted by the Post Office Horizon scandal.

items.title: Transparency data: Post Office Capture financial redress data for 2026
items.summary: Data for 2026 on redress for postmasters impacted by the Post Office Capture software.

items.title: Make Work Pay: modernising the Agency Work Regulatory Framework
items.summary: We are seeking views on proposals to improve the framework which governs the temporary labour market to better protect workers while minimising business burdens.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods: technical annex
items.summary: Technical annex for the statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under preferential trade agreements (PTAs).

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2023
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2023, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2022
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2022, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2021
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2021, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.
